item.title: Is protest a safety valve against ISIS in Tunisia?
item.description: Link here to the Washington Post Monkey Cage blog post Neil and I wrote re our findings on protest and ISIS in Tunisia. While graduate unemployment is a positive predictor of recruitment, we find suggestive evidence that protest might function to insulate individuals against the pull of ISIS.
